properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , P.* FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_NO , CATE1_NAME , CATE2_NAME , PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_BRAND , PRODUCT_PRICE , PRODUCT_DATE , PRODUCT_STATUS FROM PRODUCT JOIN PRODUCT_CATEGORY2 USING(CATE2_NO) JOIN PRODUCT_CATEGORY1 USING(CATE1_NO) ORDER BY PRODUCT_DATE DESC ) P ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
